text: lqd 'ushrik alyhwd biallah eindama zaeamuu 'ana ezyrana abn allh. wa'ashrak alnasaraa biallah eindama addaeu 'ana almasih abn allh. whdha alqawl akhtlqwh min eind anfshm, wahum bdhlk la yshabhwn qawl almushrikin min qblhm. qatal allah almushrikin jmyeana kayf yaedilun ean alhaqu 'iilaa albatl?
